If you check the posts I've already mentioned these ideas to Dawg, 
and he insisted Yanosh@a shot them down.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> The thing is that teleporting often leads to superpoweful chars 
that can 
> never be hit (I'd know, Zardus used to have that ability, and it 
made him 
> almost impossible to hit. Untill I got rid of it). That's why I 
think 
> teleportation should take alot of energy, or else we'll have 
invincible bots 
> teleporting around the battlefield.
